participant_abstract.sent: This was a conceptual design meeting in the framework of the remote control project.
Industrial Designer presented conceptual specification of components, properties and materials and User Interface Designer presented conceptual specification of user interface.
Gave an overview of the current trends.
Decisions were taken jointly according to the presentations (see bellow).

participant_actions.sent: The Industrial Designer will work on the look-and-feel design and the User Interface Designer will work on the user-interface design, then both of them will work together on the first prototype.
Marketing Expert will lead the product evaluation.

participant_decisions.sent: Fancy aspect of the remote control is very important: according to current trend, we decided to make a remote control shaped as a banana (fruit shape things are trendy nowadays), moreover this is the color of our beloved company.
The yellow color also ensure that the remote control will be easy to find.
The material of the remote control should be spongy: it is trendy and it makes the remote control more robust.
So the remote control will be in a hard banana shaped case covered by a yellow spongy surface.
The wheel to change channel has been kept in our design: even if it introduces a cost increase, it also makes the remote control easy to use and innovative which are two important aspects for users.
The energy will be provided by standard batteries.
They were no specific problems related to chip on print.

participant_problems.sent: No specific problem at this stage.
